Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\base\ViewEvent

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\base\ViewEvent » yii\base\Event » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Available since version2.0
Source Code
ViewEvent represents events triggered by the yii\base\View component.

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$name string The event name yii\base\Event
$sender object The sender of this event yii\base\Event
$handled boolean Whether the event is handled yii\base\Event
$data mixed The data that is passed to yii\base\Component::on() when attaching an event handler yii\base\Event
$output string The rendering result of yii\base\View::renderFile() yii\base\ViewEvent
$viewFile string The view file path that is being rendered by yii\base\View::renderFile() yii\base\ViewEvent
$isValid boolean Whether to continue rendering the view file yii\base\ViewEvent

Property Details

$output property
string $output = null

The rendering result of yii\base\View::renderFile(). Event handlers may modify this property and the modified output will be returned by yii\base\View::renderFile(). This property is only used by yii\base\View::EVENT_AFTER_RENDER event.

$viewFile property
string $viewFile = null

The view file path that is being rendered by yii\base\View::renderFile().

$isValid property
boolean $isValid = true

Whether to continue rendering the view file. Event handlers of yii\base\View::EVENT_BEFORE_RENDER may set this property to decide whether to continue rendering the current view file.

Method Details

__construct() method
void __construct( $viewFile, $config = [] )
$viewFile string The view file path that is being rendered by yii\base\View::renderFile().
$config array Name-value pairs that will be used to initialize the object properties

Constructor.
